Class MeasuringDevice

    public class MeasuringDevice
extends TCPClient
    Simulates a measuring device that constantly sends data to a server.

    Vlad-Adrian Moglan

    • Constructor Detail

      • MeasuringDevice

        public MeasuringDevice(java.lang.String addr,
                       int port,
                       int period)
                throws java.net.UnknownHostException,
                       java.io.IOException
        Parameters:
        addr - the address of the remote host
        port - the port on which the remote host runs
        period - determines the frequency at which the client sends messages towards the server
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - when socket reading and writing errors occur
        java.net.UnknownHostException - if the host cannot be resolved
